name: script4j
description: Script4J is a set of libraries that allows to write programs and libraries in TypeScript/JavaScript using Java API
author: Pavel Kastornyy <pavelkastornyy@gmail.com>
license: GNU General Public License, version 2, with the Classpath Exception

scripts.install-all: npm install && gulp install-modules  && jsonlint -i package.json -t '    '
scripts.uninstall-all: gulp uninstall-modules && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.reinstall-all: npm run uninstall-all && npm run install-all
